Locations.Name: Entrance
Locations.Description: This is the entrance room. Passages lead north, east, and west.

Locations.Name: Storage
Locations.Description: You are in a small storage room. There is an exit to the west.

Locations.Name: Throne Room
Locations.Description: There is a big ass throne here. An opening lies to the south.

Locations.Name: Pool
Locations.Description: It's very very wet here.  The entrance room is to the east.
